summary: Most of us don't know where their money is. However, one thing is for certain, it's is not in the bank to which we entrusted it. The bank and our money is already a part of the cycle of the global money market.
cast: Mark Mobius|Mirko Kovats|K. Sujatha Raaju|Gerhard Schwarz|John Christensen|Yves Delisle|Francis Kologo|Anton Schneider|Werner Rügemer|John Perkins|Antonio Baena Pérez|Miguel Angel Torres|Ramón Fernandéz Durán|George Belton|Joseph James|Antonio Jinanez|Kalvilselven|Animata Kompaore|Terry le Sueur|Mr. Nuridden|Hermann Scheer|Karafahan Tani|Martin Walker
keywords: money falling through the air|financialization|globalization|banking|punctuation in title
title: Vamos a hacer dinero
